name: Oh, Canada!
summary: Oh, Canada! is a fast-paced trivia game that challenges your knowledge of the Great White North in a high-stakes, game show-style format. Answer 15 increasingly difficult questions drawn from a curated pool of over 40, covering Canadian geography, history, pop culture, and more, as you climb from $100 to a pretend $1,000,000. Use lifelines like Call a Friend, Ask the Public, and 50/50 to stay in the game, with full gamepad support and a dramatic soundtrack to keep the pressure on. Whether you're a proud Canuck or just maple-curious, Oh, Canada! brings quiz-night fun to your living room.

name: Ohanabatake no Flore
summary: The story is about Flore, Parfait and Rinette who are 11 years old and like growing flowers. Grow over 50 different varieties of flowers with them!

name: Oh My Yokai!
summary:
When you receive an acceptance letter from the elite Fumikashi Academy, you’re sure there must have been a mistake. After all, you didn’t even apply to go there. Yet at your father’s urging, you accept the invitation and become the academy’s newest student.

On your first day, however, you learn the startling truth—Fumikashi Academy is also known as the Yokai Academy, and all of its students are yokai!

You never really believed the stories about yokai, but now you can’t deny that they exist. The headmaster hopes you will help bring peace between your kind and theirs, but not everyone there is happy to see you.
Can you survive the school year as the only human at an all-yokai school?

name: OhShape
summary: OhShape is a rhythm VR game where players have to move their full body to go through, punch or dodge walls following the beat of the music. It's an immersive game for all type of players inspired by the Japanese TV show Hole in the Wall.

name: Oh So Hero!
summary: Oh So Hero! is a lewd furry metroidvania game! Play as the dragonesque Joe to fight and fornicate with your rivals, get intimate with a menagerie of anthropomorphic characters, and embark on a sex-filled adventure to win the mysterious alien tournament being held on Joe's island!

name: Oh? Me
summary: "OH?ME" is a pixel-art puzzle game about growth, memories, and farewells. Play as a ghost exploring the fragments of your past, uncovering hidden clues to different endings. Will you move forward, find warmth in memories, or lose yourself in time?

name: Oh no! I'm about to fall in love!
summary: The user takes on the role of the male protagonist Lu Shichuan and embarks on a journey of time and space with a photo. They meet seven beautiful women with completely different personalities and appearances. The final chapter of who you can stay with in the world is up to you to decide.

name: Ohr Oni
summary: Ohr Oni is an Ao Oni spinoff game created with the OHRRPGCE (Official Hamster Republic Role Playing Game Creation Engine), a program that was pretty popular in the late 90s/early 00s pre-RPG Maker years. It is made in the style of late-80s Famicom games like Sweet Home and MOTHER, so if you’ve ever wanted to be chased around by a very cute, chunky 8-bit Oni, then this is your chance. The game is veeeeerrrry short (for players on their second playthrough, it can be cleared in less than 15 minutes) and has two endings.

name: Oh Boy Cheese Remastered
summary: Prepare for more cheesey action as you grab the cheese again hop on the broom one last time and remember get those presents when the game is finished dont forget to jump onto the scoreboard now you and a friend can team-up for an even higher score also go 4 player vs or take your skills online

name: Oh My God! Crush!
summary: What is the most heart wrenching moment for you? Is it a warm smile from the person you like? Or was it a sudden surprise waiting for him? Is it the sweet expectation of ordinary life? Or a sudden look back after a thousand twists and turns—— Oh my goodness! It's a heartwarming feeling.

name: Oh Snap! The Photo Charades Game
summary: Oh Snap is a turn-based, collaborative guessing game where players draw on top of photos to convey words to their friends.

name: Oh! Robot: Legendary Mechanic
summary: A top-down shooting game where you board a robot and fight against runaway robots. We invite you to the shooting chaos! Robot boarding complete! Let's go!

name: Oh High!
summary: With the push of a button, climb and climb an endless mountain

name: Oh...Sir! The Hollywood Roast
summary: The boys are back , and they look better than ever! Oh…Sir! The Hollywood roast is a brand new spinoff to the surprise indie hit 0f 2016, Oh…Sir!! The Insult Simulator. This time around we’re taking tinsel town down a few notches, whilst classing up the joint. Play as one of many famous, but for legal purposes, slightly different pop culture icons and verbally spar with other Hollywood elitists using a deep battle system

name: O Horror Amarelo
summary: Angela is a young woman who suffered various traumas in her childhood and adolescence, her life plunged into nightmares and anxiety attacks. After being referred to a hypnologist and psychotherapist by her psychologist, the young woman begins a journey through her memories in search of a cure for her problems. What she didn't know was that this internal journey would awaken and bring to light terrible secrets, hidden fears that flirt with the darkness and insanity of the human mind? before the watchful eyes of unnameable mysteries that roam in the shadows of the cosmos.

name: Oh My Dog
summary:
Collect your cute dog heroes, lead them in battlefield, and defeat whatever as you like!The weak can defeat the strong via flexible strategy changes!
Idle game with offline rewards, some contents are not free.
5v5 solo gameplay.

name: Oh, My Orbs...
summary:
Each orb has its own rules. Figure them out in order to complete levels!
If you are stuck, try revisiting previous levels.

name: Oh, You Touch My Balls
summary: Oh, You Touch My Balls is a physics puzzle game. Solve the puzzle and guide the ball into the cup.

name: Ohio John: Get Out!
summary: Ohio John: Get Out! is a short pixelated platformer adventure inspired by famous characters from the fourth and fifth generations of consoles, also featuring an Infinite Runner mode for extra replay value.

name: Ohmydollz
summary: Join the best on-line girl community. Play a fashion and decoration game! And make tons of new friends!

name: Oh Tennis
summary: In a universe where tennis is powered by screaming, you must yell louder than the rest if you want to be crowned the ultimate noisemaker or tennis player. So go and scream at your friends in PvP mode, or yell at an AI-driven robot in PvA. There's no way to enjoy tennis if you don't shout a little.

name: Oh My God, Look At This Knight
summary: Grab your shiny helmet and trusty sword, gather all the valor and honor you have, and show everyone, what being the true knight actually means!

name: Oh Demon! Fix my TV
summary: In this horror, comedy, and puzzle game, you will play as a demon summoned by an old woman to fix her television, sending you on an adventure beyond all reason.

name: OHV
summary: Build your own buggy. Obtain, maintain and tune your OHV car. A game set in Poland in the 90s.

name: Ohayou! Beginner's Japanese
summary: An educational game that will teach you the basics of Japanese Hiragana and Katakana.

name: Oh Baby! Kart
summary: Kart Racing. Ultimate abilities. Over 100+ Karts. 100+ Challenges. Unique racing modes including Race Royale and Grand Prix Duo.

name: Oh That's Why
summary:
Oh That’s Why is a short 2D metroidbrainia adventure game about exploring the mystery of a cave in looped spacetime.
Light the candles, look for hidden paths, and maybe you'll find the cause of this strange loop! Or is there a cause at all? Graphics and code were created by two people, but the music was collected from the vast expanse of the internet.

name: Oh, to Bee in Love
summary: A bee muses on new love in spring.

name: Oh Sheep!
summary: Oh sheep! is a fast paced arcade game where you gather and protect sheeps from monstrous creatures for the highest score!

name: Oh Joes! (A Proto Man Adventure)
summary: Oh Joes! (A Proto Man Adventure) is a short Mega Man fangame that sends Proto Man on a mission to reclaim his stolen Proto Shield from a fortress full of Joes. It's more of a puzzle and strategy game than it is a traditional Mega Man game—you can force your way through everything, but the challenges are specifically designed to get you to think before you act. The game is intended to be a solid challenge for experienced players, yet accessible to players of any skill level.

name: Oh No!
summary:
A Japan-only game where players control a group of endlessly running children, avoiding obstacles and completing dancing mini-games.

The game focuses on the three brothers and their misadventure and has a large emphasis on the comedic animated sequences in between stages.

The game is over if any of the characters in the group falls or gets caught in an obstacle and goes off the screen.
The game is also over if the life gauge keeps decreasing (hunger) and becomes zero.
Therefore, the player must continue to acquire food placed throughout the stage, but since Vladaa hates fish, his life gauge will decrease drastically if he takes a fish burger.

Depending on the stage, the group will include his father, grandfather, and grocer, and up to four people must be controlled at the same time, making the game very challenging.

It features Shiro Suzuki, an announcer affiliated with TBS (at the time) who was popular on Japanese television at the time, as the narrator, and his picture also appears on the package.

name: Oh Crab!
summary: Oh Crab! is a sitcom game that you shouldn't buy set on a beach about a fish whose house gets flooded and trampled.The game is NOT a good game and we highly discourage anyone from getting it.

name: Oh No! Bugs!
summary: Oh No! Bugs! Is a casual arcade game where you squash bugs by pushing blocks. Play solo or with friends, locally or online!

name: Oh So Lucky! Doctor : A Surgery Soap Opera
summary: Oh So Lucky! Doctor is a new type of soap opera game with hospital surgery simulation.

name: Oh to be a ghost bringing a scarf to my beloved
summary: A cute little mostly point-and-click game about ghosts in love. your partner is cold. bring a scarf to them <3

name: Oh! Edo Towns
summary: Build your own Japanese town during the Edo Period in Oh! Edo Towns. From acclaimed mobile games developer Kairosoft.

name: Oh No! More Lemmings
summary: Oh No! More Lemmings is the follow-up to Lemmings. The game features 100 new levels, and all-new graphics and music. It was released in both a stand-alone and an add-on version.

name: Oh My Godheads
summary: Sprint headlong into a multiplayer world of fast and frenetic, Capture-the-Head, mayhem. Beware the heads, they have a tendency to kill those around them!

name: Oh, Bugger!
summary: ‘Oh, Bugger!’ is a first-person shooter set in a luxury space hotel overrun by alien hordes. As a professional alien exterminator, pilot your mech to blast aliens and destroy their eggs, ending the infestation for good!

name: Oh My Gore!
summary:
Control the Powers of Evil to crush the Good Guys!
Take control of the revived God of War Raelius, recruit evil minions, build bastions of doom and command your groveling servants.

name: Oh Deer
summary: One Hunter, and up to four more friends disguised as deer. In this thrilling game of hide-and-seek where every move could be the last. Will you blend in with the herd or stand out? Oh Deer...

name: Oh No! I Died and Woke Up a Greek God!
summary: Oh No! You died and were reborn as a god on Mount Olympus! Your goal is to find a way back to Earth! The problem? Gods keep falling in love with you! Go on dates, party through the night, and find out what’s happening on this crazy mountain!

name: Oh Jeez, Oh No, My Rabbits Are Gone!
summary: A scary noise in the night has spooked your poor rabbits, and now all 100 of them have scattered across the valley! Run, climb, jump, and call out commands to your darling bunnies to bring them home to safety in this short n' sweet puzzle platformer — but make sure to be home before dark.

name: Oh...Sir!! The Insult Simulator
summary: The parrot is back from the dead bringing countless new insults for your disposal, Sir! Remember that silly game that parted lovers, destroyed families and turned friends into enemies? Here’s its successor that does even more, certainly with more style and more variety. And I have proof! This time you can spread affront to everyone in the world that has Internet access or - if you’re not the most sociable - you can sit alone and play with yourself. Nudge nudge.

name: Oh My Wrench
summary:
How long can you survive the road?

In Oh My Wrench, you’ll take the wheel in an endless car-driving adventure where the main goal is to survive as long as possible while dodging unpredictable obstacles. As you progress, the speed increases, pushing your reflexes to the limit. Compete for the highest score on a global leaderboard that now features both all-time and weekly rankings, giving you fresh opportunities to shine every week!

To spice up the challenge, pick up bonuses along the way: grab an extra life to keep going, a time-slowing hourglass to catch your breath, or special coins to boost your score. Combined with a fast-paced day-night cycle and dynamic weather shifts, every moment feels fresh, thrilling, and filled with new surprises.

Can you navigate the chaos, collect the bonuses, and claim the top spot? Find out in Oh My Wrench!

name: Oha Star 645: Musshees no Fushigi na Nouen - Yoshimoto Geinin to Tomodachi Net
Oh! You Monster!
summary: A cardboard box speed-dating simulator.

name: Oh No! Ninjas!
summary: Oh no! Ninjas are attacking! Type words to defeat them!

name: Oh Mummy
summary:
The object of the game is to unveil all of the treasure within each level (or pyramid) of the game whilst avoiding the mummies. Each level consists of a two-dimensional board. In contrast with Pac-Man as the player's character walks around footprints are left behind. By surrounding an area of the maze with footprints its content is revealed, which is either a scroll, a mummy, a key, a tomb or nothing at all. In order to complete a level it is necessary to unveil the key and a tombstone. The scroll enables the player to kill/eat one mummy on the level. If a mummy is unveiled it follows the player to the next level. The difficulty and speed of the game increases as the player progresses through the levels.

The game is for one player only. Whilst, even at the time, it was considered simple in terms of gameplay, graphics and sound it was for many people one of the better and more addictive early offerings for the Amstrad.

The music played during gameplay is based on a children's song known as The Streets of Cairo, or the Poor Little Country Maid.

name: Oh My Anne
summary:
Embark on a serene adventure in "Oh My Anne"!

Experience the life of Anne Shirley in Avonlea, as you immerse yourself in calming match-3 puzzles and the joy of renovating the historic Green Gables.

Every chapter unlocks a part of Anne's heartwarming encounters and house makeovers.

name: Oh Putt Off!
summary: Have you ever tried to hit a UFO with a golfball? You might try when they steal your wifi

name: Oh the Frustration: Dev Edition
summary:
Avoid spikes, pits, and blood thirsty monster as you fight your way through over 50 levels across 6 worlds!

Unlock 9 different characters to help you along the way.

name: Oh No! More Zombies Ate My Neighbors
summary: Almost 10 years in the making, a complete hack/ unofficial sequel including 55 all new levels, new gameplay options, items, enemies and more!

name: Oha Suta Dance Dance Revolution GB
summary: A version of the Dance Dance Revolution GB series focusing on songs from OhaSuta, a Japanese morning childrens television program.

name: Ohana Island: Blast & Build
summary:
Forget about all the hustle and bustle of the city, and live a life away from worry in the brand new matching game "Ohana Island"️!
Push open windows, breathe in the fresh air, and enjoy puzzles & delicate flowers in your shop at the seaside.

name: Oh Shit!
summary: An MSX game that is heavily inspired by Pac-Man. The game was released as 'Oh No!' in certain regions.

name: OhMyWitch!
summary:
It is the first year I have had the chance to join the Halloween parade. But why the monster kidnapped me to the other world?! And this charming monster wants me to be his Witch. What do you think I should do?!

On the other hand, I also met the cat I lost. But why did he suddenly become a human?!

name: Oh Yeah
summary: How much imagination do you have about the ways of love?

name: Oh My Eggs
summary: Oh My Eggs is a wave survival game in which you'll defend your brother's eggs that predators are stealing, acquire eggs, and trade them for upgrades, weapons, and specials.

name: Ohno Odyssey
summary: The Ohnos have a problem: they've prematurely escaped from their ship after an accident, prompting them all to sigh, “Oh no,” at their collective clumsiness. All but the head engineer have hastily left in escape pods, only to arrive on a strange planet called Earth. The stranded Ohnos are in need of rescuing before they are discovered.

name: Oh! RPG!
summary: Heroes always win! But what happens to those who don't? Play as unique and colorful characters as the world comes to an end after our heroes' utter defeat.

name: Oh's Talk English
summary: An edutainment game designed to teach Korean students how to speak English.

name: Ohio Distinctive Software Vol. 1
summary: An old PC learning game for kids comprised of 4 CD disks that had many ODS mini games.

name: Oh Balls Merge
summary: Drop, merge, score - "Oh Balls" is an addictive game. Merge falling balls to create bigger ones and aim for high scores. Stay alert to prevent the stack from reaching the top. Challenge your skills, chase the highest score, and enjoy the ball-merging frenzy of "Oh Balls"! Install now for endless fun!

name: Oh...Sir! Prototype
summary:
A Ridiculous local 1v1muliplayer Insult Simulator for two!

This is the prototype that started it all! This build was oringially created in 42 hours during the amJam game jam event hosted by Artifex Mundi. The competition’s theme was "this parrot is no more" based on the Monty Pythons' Dead Parrot sketch. Oh...Sir! came in second and received an audience award. Subsequently we decided to release this prototype into the world, and much to our surprise players enjoyed it as much as we do! We were thrilled to receive all of their feedback and feature requests and decided to build upon them and create a honest-to-goodness real game called Oh...Sir The Insult Simulator. However we still wanted players to be able to play the original protoype that started it all, so here it is!

If you think your best friend's mother is a hamster and your boss smells of elderberries, invite them to play Oh...Sir!, a jolly video game about dead parrots and insulting the *BLEEP* out of your beloved loved ones. A game where your sister can convince you that your hovercraft is full of eels and your hat is silly! You should always look on the bright side of life - even the harshest insult can be classy when said over a cup of tea. So track down a best friend, and enjoy the greatest local 1v1 multiplayer insult simulator game of the century!

name: Oha Star Produce! Gentei Collabo Game Disc!!
summary: A bonus game packaged with Japanese editions of We Cheer. Made from a collab with the children's daytime TV Show Oha Suta (Oha Star), and features music from the show.

name: Oh Boy More Cheese
summary: Oh boy more cheesy fun with 4 different modes find your way through the mazes and hope to escape before your opponent play with cats on or off or maybe find the cheese and unlock the doors or do it all whatever you choose it will be cheesy fun

name: Oh, It's Christmas
summary: Are we not in August though?

name: Oh No! It's An Alien Invasion: Turret Alert
summary: Stay on high alert in this action packed game that's easy to learn but hard to master! Aim your weapon and tap to shoot as you make your way through S.W.E.E.T's secret hideout! Swipe to build combos and knock out multiple aliens.

name: Oh, My Word! 2
summary: A word game from Mobile Pie.

name: Oh! Mochi!
summary: Oh! Mochi! is a comical action fighting game.Strange rice cakes rampage in Japan! Spin around your Mochi's head! Defeat all! Aim for the strongest Mochi!!

name: Oh the Humanity!
summary: An alien civilization found the remaining ruins of the humans, millions of years after they went extinct. Aliens think humans were vicious, fool and disgusting creatures based on its own research. Almost no technology was found, except some petrified war machines and vehicles.

name: Oh, My Word!
summary: A word game from Mobile Pie.

name: Oh no, u have to make a game
summary: A game about accomplishment via procrastination.

name: Oh No, My Moustache!
summary:
An arcade, vertical shoot 'Em up where you play as Fred, a barman of a wild west saloon.
But… Oh no, some stranger robots have appeared out of nowhere, equipped with razors and apparently they want to… cut your fabulous moustache?
That can't happen. So you must defend yourself, avoiding them to get close to you throwing them the only thing that you have, shots of tequila.
Survive as long as you can. The more robots you kill, the stronger they get and the more they will come after you. Each robot eliminated will grant you some points, try to get the highest score!

name: Oh no! More Lemmings
summary: This port of Oh No! More Lemmings sees the resolution noticeably increase compared to the original, which can be very obvious when viewing the lemming sprites. The soundtrack also gets clearer and in better quality overall.

name: Oh! Gacchiman Kyuukyoku no Omega Chinpou to Momige 26
Oh, Terry!
summary: A visual novel about a monster lover

name: Oh, Hel No!
summary: Get ready to raise a little hell as an ambitious Demon Imp who’s been kicked out of Hel and stuck with the surface-dwellers. Time to flex those horns, fight, level up, and prove you’ve got what it takes to handle Hel’s hottest challenges and maybe—just maybe—claim the throne as Hel’s new big boss!

name: Oh My Cooking Gun
summary:
"Oh my Cooking Gun" is a virtual reality clay shooting game for all ages. A magical cooking gun turns animals into food! Change the flying animals in a peaceful, quiet rural farm to food! It is a game that anyone can enjoy easily, fun and comfortably. World ranking is provided. Renew your records, compete with your friends and boast! 
You can play with Oculus lift.

name: Oh Frog
summary: Oh Frog is a loopy 2D action adventure game set in the mysterious, fairy tale-esque lands of the Frog Kingdom. Play as Lif, the Frog Kingdom’s bravest frog, as you travel through gorgeous, lovingly hand-drawn landscapes and animated worlds, on your quest to recover the stolen Crowns of Power!

name: Ohmygod Are You Alright?
summary: Anna Anthropy's successor to dys4ia deals with the struggle that comes after being struck by a car.

name: OHM 2
summary: OHM2 is a compilation of 32 maps that have been made in about an hour each. The idea of this "project" was to make a map in one hour, and then record yourself play the previous map that was posted.

name: O! Holy Knight
summary: O! Holy Knight is a survivors game that focuses on controlling a fantasy medieval squad of knights to survive waves of monsters.

name: Oh! Fuse Box
summary: This is a new remake of a puzzle game that connects pipes.

name: Oh Ship Arena
summary: Take command of your ship, step into the arena and test your skills, and dominate your opponents!

name: Oh, Brave New “Red” World!
summary: This is the game in the genre of Vertical Shoot’Em Up. Using only your mouse, you will lead one of the “Stalin` falcons” and take part in the Liberation Campaign of the Red Army in the far distant future.

name: OHM 1
summary: OHM1 is a compilation of 33 maps that have been made in about an hour each. The idea of this "project" was to make a map in one hour, and then record yourself play the previous map that was posted.

name: OhShape Ultimate
summary:
Enjoy this celebrated VR rhythm game that offers a unique way of moving your whole body with a renewed look and lots of extra content, for this new era!
In addition to the classic wall-punching, obstacle-dodging, and fun pose-making, get your full-body cardio workout with 6 new sessions and 2 difficulty levels, designed to make you sweat and engage every part of your body!

name: Oh Mummy Genesis
summary:
Oh Mummy Genesis is an unlicensed Sega Mega Drive game developed and published by 1985 Alternativo. It was released in October 2012 and serves as an unofficial update to the game Oh Mummy, originally released by Gem Software for the Amstrad CPC, MSX and ZX Spectrum in 1984. As well as providing a port of the original version, Oh Mummy Genesis features an updated version with enhanced graphics and sound. 
 
1985 Alternativo released the ROM as freeware in 2013, after stocks of boxed copies of the game ran out.

name: Oh, Flock!
summary: After a strange series of events you find yourself shoved into the role of a Shephard on a very peculiar farm! With only your wits and trusty cursor by your side guide your flock of sheep through a series of environments filled with a variety of obstacles and predators!

name: Oh Trap!
summary: Oh Trap! is a couch co-op game for 2 or 4 players. Steal the other team’s treasures! Place traps strategically to either help yourself or stop your opponents.

name: Oh the Biomes You'll Go
summary: Oh the Biomes You'll Go is an exploration and adventure mod designed to take you on a road trip across Minecraft like no other! Explore over 80 magical, realistic, and breathtaking biomes.

name: Oh My God! It's Joseph Joestar In Subarashii: X-Mas Mode In July
summary: Sonic Uncovers Banning And Realizes Anime Spoilers Hurt Intricate Ideas is... a mouthful. I mean, it's the sequel to Sugoi, a community project that ended up way more successful than I had ever anticipated! So I thought, why not make a sequel? Turns out, this also became more successful than I had ever anticipated! If you missed out last time, here's what went down: I gave everyone a month to make a level, tied them together with a hub level and a final boss, and released it! It's the result's a mod by the community, for the community! None of this would've been possible without the massive contributions I received. While the basic format is the same as last time, I tried to do some extra stuff to make this one unique in its own ways.

name: Oha Suta Dance Dance Revolution
summary: Oha Suta Dance Dance Revolution is a Japan-exclusive DDR that primarily features songs from the kids show Oha Suta. There are a few Konami original songs thrown in for good measure.

name: Oh Chute!
summary:
You are Ron Danger, stunt person and extreme sports enthusiast. You just can’t get enough of sky-diving, but the local helicopter pilots have had it with your antics and are out to get you… It’s up to you to show them who’s boss!

Choose one of four different levels of varying difficulty and see how long you can survive. Sky-diving is hard enough alone, but those darned pilots aren’t going to make it any easier for you. Keep an eye on their movement and choose the right time to open your ‘chute and manoeuvre to one of the designated landing zones.

name: Oh No, Angry Emoji's are Trying to Kill Me!
Oh My Godheads: Party Edition
summary: • Grab eleven Godheads with their own game-changing abilities, such as explosions, mind-control and freeze

name: Oh Snake!
summary: A retro-arcade "infinite-slitherer." How loooong can you survive?

name: Oh Shit Boulder
summary: Oh Shit Boulder is a action runner game that involves the treasure hunter Ray to seek out the valuable cursed idol that is deep in the jungle. Play as the Treasure Hunter as he journeys to get the cursed idols and must way his way back to sell the idol.

name: Oh Sheep!: Baaaa
summary: Embark on the fantastic world of Oh Sheep!, a slapstick cartoon-style action game where you'll encounter crazy enemies. Sheep will be your salvation.

name: Ohr
summary: The people's cries have activated ancient Ohr deposits and woken you from your slumber. Now you must help them to find their frequencies, their souls ... your heaven.

name: Oh, Dungeon Master
summary: Oh, Dungeon Master is a dungeon simulator, with elements of a roguelike game. Explore the intricate underground mazes and dense forests to exterminate monsters and find all the pictures!

name: Oh My Lord
summary: Manage your medieval fantasy city, balance resources, and navigate the demands of different factions. Unlock new characters to join your city and help maintain order.

name: Oh No
summary: A game about trying to escape the historian and philosopher Michel Foucault.

name: Ohanaya-san Monogatari GBA
summary: Ohanaya-san Monogatari GBA is a Strategy game, published by TDK Core, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Oh Satan, I Gotta Hide
summary: A Prophunt game made by Students at a school Named "Asane Folkehogskole" in norway Hide around our school or look for the monster's that have become Props

name: Oh! Sheep
summary:
Command a group of wooly friends to save the world from the evil Dr.Friedrich in this fun and challenging path-drawing puzzle game!
Lead a herd of sheep by drawing paths to command them and get past obstacles.
Steal magic berries from the mad scientist to save the world. Use the berries to change color and trigger switches to help the sheep escape!

name: Ohota Krepkoe
summary: Ohota Krepkoe is a universal solution to problems with lack of time, money and health to meet the male need for dominance over the "mother of nature"!

name: Oh, honey! Anime clicker!
summary: Welcome to Oh, Honey! Anime Clicker!, a simple clicker game set in a delightful anime-style! In this game, you'll tap to accumulate points.

name: Oh My Goat
summary: Oh My Goat is a platform game packed with action and millimetric jumps in which reflexes are the key. You will travel through different worlds and benefit from the skills of the animals you save to dodge and jump hundreds of obstacles that await you along the path.

name: OH! My Office
summary: An office simulation game that tests your lightning-fast reflexes and multi-tasking skills. Manage your employees and make sure they don't slack off by micro-managing them with an assortment of reinforcement tools at your disposal.

name: Oh! Jaemi
summary: A Korean developed online multiplayer shooter that was an extension mod to White Day: A Labyrinth Named School.

name: Oh My Cod!!: We Mer-Made For Each Other!
summary:
Elise, an introverted marine biology student wins a 3 month trip to Papua New Guinea to study the Coral Sea! However, upon her first expedition, she meets a mermaid caught in plastic in the waters who offers to teach her all about life deep under the surface from a first-hand-resident. Elise eagerly takes this opportunity to learn, and the opportunity to talk to a charming girl her age!

She might be sacrificing facts for fondness because her source unfortunately isn’t very reliable…

name: Oh Darling! I Hate To Tell You This...
summary: Little Darling makes a wish at the place where all the wishes come true. Then her journey begins. She has to fight against the monsters with the power of light.

name: Oh Boy Cheese
summary:
Have some cheesy fun with two modes of cheesy madness.
Try tojump onto scoreboard by collecting the cheese or just have some casual fun.
Play one wacky mode, with trampolines, planes, presents and explosions.
Whatever you choose it will be cheesetastic.

name: Oh My Giraffe
summary: Eat fruits while being chased by lions.

name: OhMyRace!
summary: OhMyRun! is a competitive platformer game playable up to 10 players. Face off against your friends in wacky races using powers and be the first to finish in a frenzied competition!

name: Oh, Deer!
summary: "Oh, Deer!" is a video game about drifting your station wagon along the Perfect Line to Grandma’s House. Is it a metaphor for the futility of human existence? Is it a militant vegan parable? Is it a crass advertisement for family automobiles? Let the mystery unfold before you.

name: Oh My Pool!
summary:
Oh My Pool‪! is very simple and fun game for the whole family. You need simply gather balls in the swimming pool, but watch out for cute sea inhabitants.

In the swimming pool you’ll see enemies such as octopuses and turtles. But don't worry. There is no cruelty in the game. Just collect the balls and avoid the enemies.

The game is endless. Just gather as many balls in the swimming pool as possible and compete with your friends!

name: Oh My God!
summary: Challenge The Lord Almighty in this puzzle game.

name: Oh Shit I'm Dreaming Again
summary: A surreal adventure game about being stuck in a looping dream that never ends.

name: Oh, Yes! Kasshoku Hitozuma no Seiyoku Kaishou ~Ero Ero Dekiru Mama-san Volley Kai~
summary:
I broke the cherished glass of my mother’s. As a punishment, I was made to serve and do odd chores for a fixed period in the volleyball club, my mother does as a hobby.

But perhaps, might not there be some young married woman and elder sisters among them!
…While I carried such hope, there was no one except typical aunts.
There was not even a fragment of elder sister types among anyone I looked at.

name: Oh No! More Lemmings
summary: The DOS port of this game is mostly the same graphically compared to the original Amiga release, though there are some slight color changes (most notably in the UI which has changed from organe to yellow). The original AdLib (and by extension, Tandy 3-Voice) tracks are generally longer than the Amiga arrangement, and they play in a slightly different order. The track "The smiling blues" plays before "Much joviality" and "Not at all serious". This game was released as a stand-alone expansion or an add-on, and could picked up either as a 3.5" or 5.25" floppy disk.

name: Ohka Bots
summary:
Ohka Bots is a free-to-play action role-playing multiplayer online game available for PC.

A battle to save Cyberspace and become the strongest BOT you can be. Upgrade and customize your BOT as you power up and loot your way through the Virus threat that has infested Cyberspace.
